bug.short_desc: update Gerrit icon to diffy the kung fu review cuckoo

long_desc.thetext: We should file a CQ to reuse the new Gerrit logo: http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gerrit-static/diffy-w200.png and obtain 16x16 and a 7x8 version.
LOL. That summary took me a minute to decipher.
The CQ was approved! Let's go for this.
Nice! Posted a screenshot here: https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/attachment.cgi?id=235358. Let's do a quick review during tomorrow's call.

(In reply to Tomasz Zarna from comment #6) > Diffy's head
IMO this looks better, still requires some pixels to be moved around, but at least it bears a resemblance to Diffy.

Created attachment 235416 Diffy in the wild
Both icons as in https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/16283/2
Hope that change doesn't introduce too many regressions. I like the choice of using a partial headshot, looks good.
We also need to update the 32x32 gerrit32.png icon in the org.eclipse.mylyn.discovery-directory bundle.

(In reply to comment #10) > We also need to update the 32x32 gerrit32.png icon in the > org.eclipse.mylyn.discovery-directory bundle.
Review for that: https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/16634/

Created attachment 235656 Tuning
Is this any better? https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/16283/2 on the left, the tuned icon from my workspace on the right.
Thanks! I merged the discovery change. I like the tuned icons slightly better. Please feel free to merge!

Hey guys. Since this change, EGit and Mylyn no longer use the same icon for Gerrit, see bug 423138. EGit shows the icon in the Git Repositories view in case a repository is configured for Gerrit.
Tomasz, as you're also an EGit committer, would it be possible for you take a look at this on the EGit side?
By the way, the favicon of https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/ is still the old icon, so I'm not sure which one is more recognizable, the +/- one or Diffy the Kung Fu Review Cuckoo:).

(In reply to Robin Stocker from comment #15)
> Tomasz, as you're also an EGit committer, would it be possible for you take > a look at this on the EGit side?
Sure, here's a review with updated icons: https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/20222/
> By the way, the favicon of https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/ is still > the old icon,
I think they simply forgot to update it.
>so I'm not sure which one is more recognizable, the +/- one or > Diffy the Kung Fu Review Cuckoo:).
I'm sure that once both projects start to show Diffy, everyone is going to forgot about the +/- pretty soon.

(In reply to Tomasz Zarna from comment #16) > (In reply to Robin Stocker from comment #15) > > By the way, the favicon of https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/ is still > > the old icon, > > I think they simply forgot to update it.
I filed a bug for this: https://code.google.com/p/gerrit/issues/detail?id=2614
